issue.title: [R] Update ARROW_DEPENDENCY_SOURCE to default to AUTO
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14850](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14850). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should make ARROW_DEPENDENCY_SOURCE=AUTO the default and then document how to install the dependencies (such that you can) using apt/yum; that will speed up source builds
